content: bunny version a-2 january 6 2007 materials needed -any worsted weight yarn approx 2 oz i used lamb s pride worsted -g hook or hook needed to obtain gauge -stuffing of your choice this can be wool roving polyester fiberfill fabric scraps of yarn…use your imagination -tapestry needle gauge 4 75 sts and 4 5 row per inch in single_crochet head nd round 1 chain 2 8 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in ea st around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet rnds 4-5 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet stuff w/ filling of your choice body round 10 chain 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 11 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 16 single_crochet round 12 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 13 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 20 single_crochet round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 24 single_crochet copyright © 2006 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for \\www dandeliondreamers com for further information page 1 of 1 round 16 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch 28 single_crochet rnds 18-21 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch stuff w/ filling of your choice then holding the front and back together chain 1 and slip_stitch the front and back together working through the single_crochet on both sides the beginning of your round becomes the side of the bunny finish off legs make 2 nd round 1 chain 2 8 single_crochet in 2 chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st
